School illusion (glamer); Level cleric/oracle 5, medium 4, mesmerist 5, psychic 5, sorcerer/wizard 5, spiritualist 4, witch 5;

Casting Time 1 round
Components V, S, M (one Tiny or larger living creature)

Range touch
Targets one willing undead creature touched
Duration 1 hour/level
Saving Throw Will disbelief or Will negates (see text);  Spell Resistance no

Description

This spell functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.lgfgb40gpe9f81zh]{appearance of life} (Pathfinder RPG Horror Adventures 108), except that you can disguise a single undead creature regardless of its number of Hit Dice, and the illusion also creates relevant smells, sounds, textures, and temperatures to match the appearance. If you disguise the target as a living version of itself, creatures that interact with the target take a -5 penalty on their Will saving throws to disbelieve the illusion, though if the target attacks a creature, the attacked creature no longer takes this penalty.
